noun.description: The basic monetary unit of Morocco and the United Arab Emirates, equal to 100 centimes in Morocco and 100 fils in the United Arab Emirates.
A monetary unit of Libya and Qatar, equal to one thousandth of a dinar in Libya and one hundredth of a riyal in Qatar.

origin: From Arabic, from Greek drakhmē, denoting an Attic weight or coin. Compare with drachma.
